title: Evading the Evil Duke’s Love - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Charming Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Coming of Age   Complex Family Relationships   Couple Growth   Court Official   Death   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Early Romance   European Ambience   Family   Family Conflict   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Politics   Popular Love Interests   Power Couple   R-15   Reincarnation   Royalty   Second Chance   Servants   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Wealthy Characters
author: Yoo Ran Sae   유란새
description:
Laila Estevan is the illegitimate child of a duke. Due to her illegitimate status, she had never felt that unconditional love and affection from her family. Even on her deathbed, she was ignored. She was unwanted and unloved—that’s how it had always been. The emotional baggage she carried traveled with her when she went back to the past just a month before her death. It was then that she made a firm decision: if she couldn’t receive love from her family, she would find it elsewhere!

Will Laila ever find love from others or could she find love from within?>
